258:22: atha bhagavān śrāvasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ nātidūre sthito'bhūt|

258:86: prāvara dārike imāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi imānyanekaśatasahastrmūlyānyābharaṇāni|

258:112: kṛtaṃ hi nātha praṇidhiṃ tvayā hi

258:320: atha nandimitram mahāśrāvakaṃ rāja ajitaseno gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata|
258:330: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājño'jitasenasya gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇī sthito'bhūt|
258:331: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhante sma|
258:335: hastirathaṃ ca aśvarathaṃ ca sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt|

258:340: asmin pṛthivīpradeśe mahārāja mama kuṭikaṃ kārayitavyam yatrāhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇastava gṛhe piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāmi|

258:349: triṃśadyojanāni dīrgheṇa ṣaḍyojanānyūrdhvāyāṃ saptaratnamayaṃ maṇimuktisamcchāditaṃ kuṭikaṃ kāraya|

258:355: atha so'mātyastaṃ caṃkramaṃ kāayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṃkrānto rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata|
258:365: ājñā kṛtaṃ yat tvaya yādṛśī kṛtā |
258:368: atha rājā ajitaseno yena svakā rājadhāgī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ|
258:369: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ pratinivṛtya tatraiva kuṭike niṣaṇṇo vikiraṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpanno'bhūt|
258:370: anyena keśānanyena nayanānyanyena dantānanyena grīvā anyena bāhū anyena hṛdayamanyenodaramanyenorū anyena jaṅgaghe anyena pādau samāpanno'bhūt|
258:371: atha sa rājā ajitasenaḥ saptāhasyātyayena taṃ bhikṣūṃ na paśyati||
258:375: atha sa rājā saputro yena sā kuṭikā tenopasaṃkrānto'bhūt|
258:376: atha sa rājā ajitasenastaṃ bhikṣumātmabhāvam khaṇḍaṃ khāṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ dṛstvā saṃśayajāto'bhūt|
258:377: saṃtrastaromakūpajāto vastrāṇi pāṭayan paridevan rudan aśrukaṇṭhaḥ putramevamāha|

258:383: ātmaghātaṃ karitvā tu niraye tvaṃ gamiṣyasi|
258:386: na cāyaṃ ghātito yakṣairna bhūtairna ca rākṣasaiḥ|
258:394: yo nāma tasya dhāreti nāsau gacchati durgatim|
258:396: atha sa rājakumārastaṃ pitaraṃ gāthā bhāsitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt|
258:398: kathaṃ tvaṃ kumāra jānīṣe yadayaṃ bhikṣuḥ samādhiṃ samāpanno'bhūt|
258:400: paśya mahārāja ayaṃ bhikṣurbodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ sarvakleśavinirmukto bhavasāgarapāraṃgataḥ sarvasattvahitārthaṃ ca mārgaṃ darśayate śubham|
258:403: atha sa rājā sa ca rājakumāro bahubhirdārakaśataiḥ sārdha yena sa caṃkramastenopasaṃkrāntau|
258:406: atha rājā taṃ bhikṣū dṛṣṭvā maulipattaṃ rājakumārasya dadāti|
258:413: na mama rājyena kāryaṃ na bhogena naiśvaryādhipatyena kāryam|
258:416: atha rājā yena sa bhikṣustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ prāñjalirevamāha|
258:432: atha sa bhikṣū ratnamaye yugye gṛhītvā yena rājadhānī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ|
258:443: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ ajitasenasya rājño gāthā bhāṣitva tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt|
258:444: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhanti sma|
258:445: atha tena bherīśabdena sarvāstā amātyakoṭyo rājānamevamāhuḥ|
258:448: saptame divase hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ rayāt|
258:449: ahaṃ saptame divase jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraṃ gamiṣyāmi śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya|
258:452: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathe avaruhya taṃ ca nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ ratnamaye rathe avarohya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ|
258:453: atha bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭrā tāna sarvaśrāvakānāmantrayat|
258:455: atha te sarve mahāśrāvakā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannā abhūvan|
258:456: atha rājā dūratastaṃ jvālāmālaṃ dṛṣṭvā nandimitramahāśrāvakamevamāha|
258:459: atra śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitiṃ dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati|
258:460: te ca bodhisattvā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannāḥ|
258:461: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathādavatīrya pādābhyāṃ putrasahasreṇa sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ|
258:462: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇena kāyena vyāmaprabhayā caṃkramate sma|
258:463: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavato rūpavarṇaliṃgasaṃsthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitvā dharaṇitale nipatitaḥ|
258:464: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya taṃ rājānamutthāpayati sma|
258:465: uttiṣṭha mahārāja kasyārthe prapatitaḥ| rājā āha|
258:478: atha bhagavān tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ|
258:479: alabdhālābhā ye [tatra] mama śāsanaṃ vaistārikaṃ bhavati|
258:481: gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja svagṛhe saptame divase āgamiṣyāmi|
258:482: atha rājā ajitasenastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītīsaumanasyajātastaṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣu purataḥsthāpya svagṛhaṃ gatvā sarvānamātyānāmantrayate sma|
258:483: sarvairgrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ gṛhe gṛhe dhvajānyucchrāpitavyāni gṛhe gṛhe ratnamayāni kumbhāni paripūrayitavyāni|
258:485: sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhitaṃ dhvajānyucchrāpitāni ratnamayāni kumbhāni paripūritāni|
258:486: yatra rājā ajitasenaḥ prativasati tatra dvādaśakoṭyo dhvajānāmucchrāpitā dvādaśakoṭyo ratnamayānāṃ kumbhānāṃ paripūritāḥ|
258:487: yāvat saptame divase tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanāndapūrṇamaitrāyaṇīputrapramukhairmahāśrāvakasaṃghaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ ajitasenasya rājño rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ|
258:488: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ puṣpapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā kalyāṇamitraṃ purataḥsthāpya bhagavantaṃ puṣpairavakiran bhagavantamevamāha|
258:492: atha bhagavān siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇo rājño'jitasenasya dharmān deśitavāg|
258:493: atha rājñā ajitasenena prabhūtenāhāreṇa khādanīyena bhojanīyena santarpitaḥ|
258:494: atha rājā ajitaseno jyeṣṭhakaṃ rājakumāraṃ dadāti|
258:514: śīghraṃ ca pravrajya mayā hi labdhaṃ
258:518: atha rājakumāro'ntarīkṣagato gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt|
258:519: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ putrasya vākyaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra ātta[ma]nāḥ pramuditaḥ [prīti]saumanasyajāto bhagavantamuddiśya vihāraṃ kārayati sma|
258:522: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito'bhūt|
258:525: bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ pravrājya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastena gamanamārabdhavān|
258:527: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno rājyaṃ parityajya vihāraṃ kārayitvā bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito'bhūt|
258:531: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno mama śāsane pravrajito bhaviṣyati|
258:532: anāgate'dhvanyaparimitaiḥ kalpairacintyairaparimāṇairajitaprabho nāma tathāgato'rhan samyak saṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
258:537: ayamānanda nandimitramahāśrāvakastatraiva kālasamaye nandiprabho nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati|
258:539: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan teṣāṃ tathāġatānāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati|
258:541: aparimitaguṇasaṃcayā nāma sā buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatreme tathāġatā bhaviṣyanti|
258:543: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayiṣyati tasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyaskandho bhaviṣyati|
258:545: yadā mayānanda duṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi caritvā bodhirabhisaṃbuddhā tadā te sattvā bodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante|
258:546: ya etaddharmaparyāyāt catuṣpadikāmapi gāthāṃ śroṣyanti avaivartikāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
258:548: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dharmabhāṇakāḥ saṃprakāśayiṣyanti teṣāṃ kidṛśaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ bhaviṣyati|
258:550: śṛṇu ānanda rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturdvīpeśvara|
258:551: ya imaṃ dhamaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyanti muktāśca bhaviṣyanti jātijarāvyādhiparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimuktā bhaviṣyanti|
258:553: ye paścime kāle paścime samaye sattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pratikṣepsyanti na pattīyiṣyanti teṣāṃ kā gatirbhaviṣyati kaḥ parāyaṇam|
258:563: raurave mahānarake hāhahe mahānarake avīcau mahānarake tiryagyonau yamaloke ca pretaviṣaye bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhamanubhavitavyam|
258:567: mā bhoḥ kulaputrā bhoḥ kvacit saddharmaṃ pratikṣepṣyatha|
258:570: kena hetunā bhagavan saddharmaḥ pratikṣipto bhavati|
258:572: ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye eteṣāṃ sūtrānudhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇākānāmakrośiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante kutsayiṣyanti paṃsayiṣyanti tasya dharmabhāṇakasya duṣṭacittamutpādyiṣyanti tebhyaḥ saddharmaḥ pratikṣipto bhaviṣyati|
258:573: yaḥ sattvaḥ trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāmakṣīṇyutpāṭayet ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandho bhavet|
258:574: evameva ya eteṣāṃ sūtra dhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇākāṇāṃ duṣṭacittaprekṣitā ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyate|
258:579: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśiṣye dhārayiṣye imaṃ nayam||
258:583: athāyuṣmānando bhagavato gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt|
258:602: ahaṃ hi paścime kāle nirvṛte tvayi nāyake|
258:621: deyadharmoyaṃ bālosiṃhena sārdha bhāryājājatitrana sārdhaṃ mātāpitroḥ paramaduṣkartroḥ sādha kṣīṇī ena akhiloṭi ena diśoṭajāja maṃgali.......utrayannagarvidoṭiena vaṭrari–khuśoṭi–khūśogoṭi ena sārdha sarvasattvaiḥ sarva......bhiryatra puṇya tadbha......sarvasattvānāmanuttaraḥ......sārdha paramakalyāṇamitrasthirabandhu ena|
